title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Remove skillet from heat and add hot pasta to the pancetta.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka masala paste for at least 2 hours.
Heat oil in a large pan and cook marinated chicken until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, saute onions until soft, then add garlic.
Add remaining tikka masala paste and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and return chicken to the pan.
Simmer for another 10 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
instructions: Wash and thoroughly dry romaine lettuce, then chop into bite-sized pieces.
For the dressing: In a blender, combine garlic, anchovies, egg yolk, lemon juice, and Dijon mustard.
Blend while slowly drizzling in olive oil until emulsified.
Season dressing with salt and pepper to taste.
In a large bowl, toss lettuce with dressing until evenly coated.
Top with croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately for best texture.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Mexican dish consisting of a small hand-sized corn or wheat tortilla topped with a filling of seasoned beef and various toppings.
instructions: In a large skillet, brown ground beef over medium-high heat, breaking it up as it cooks.
Drain excess fat from the beef.
Add taco seasoning and water according to package directions.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells in oven at 350F for 5 minutes.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and onions.
Serve with sour cream and salsa on the side.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt and extra-virgin olive oil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475F (245C) with a pizza stone if available.
On a floured surface, roll out pizza dough to desired thickness.
Mix tomato sauce with minced garlic and a pinch of salt.
Spread sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border.
Arrange mozzarella slices evenly over the sauce.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven and immediately top with fresh basil leaves.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic American cookies with chocolate chips, butter, sugar, and vanilla.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375F (190C).
In a large bowl, cream together softened butter and both sugars until fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually blend dry ingredients into the butter mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
